name: AIModelDetails
title: AI Model Details
description: Sliding details panel showing comprehensive model information, vendors, and usage statistics
functionalRequirements: Show model specs, vendor associations grouped by type, usage statistics, and open record button

properties.name: vendors
properties.description: Array of vendors associated with the model

properties.name: promptRuns
properties.description: Array of prompt runs for this model

properties.name: isOpen
properties.description: Whether the details panel is open

events.name: onClose
events.description: Fired when the details panel should close

events.name: onOpenRecord
events.description: Fired when the open record button is clicked

parameters.name: modelName
parameters.description: Name of the model to open
